data.name: AnswerLineText
data.comment: The line for the answer

data.name: AskAnExpertCarouselButtonText
data.comment: Button content for the second carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: AskAnExpertCarouselContent
data.value: If my answer isn't satisfactory, just let me know. I will connect you with our very capable experts!
data.comment: Content for the second carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: AskAnExpertCarouselTitle
data.comment: Title for the second carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: AskAQuestionCarouselButtonText
data.comment: Button text for the first carousel card

data.name: AskAQuestionCarouselCardTitle
data.comment: Title for the first carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: AskAQuestionCarouselContent
data.value: You can ask me a question by typing in the chat box below and I'll tell you what I know about it...
data.comment: Content for the first carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: FeedbackQuestionText
data.value: How relevant are the search results that were returned by the bot?
data.comment: The question asking about the relevancy of the search results returned

data.name: GiveFeedbackButtonText
data.comment: Text for the button to provide the feedback

data.name: HighlyRelevantChoiceText
data.comment: Text for the choice that represents a high relevancy for the search results

data.name: InputChoiceSetPlaceholderText
data.comment: Text for the dropdown of choices for the user to select

data.name: NotAtAllRelevantChoiceText
data.comment: Text for the choice that represents no relevancy for the search results

data.name: QuestionLineText
data.comment: The line for the question

data.name: ResponseCardTitleText
data.comment: The title text for the response adaptive card

data.name: ShareFeedbackCarouselButtonText
data.comment: Button content for the third carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: ShareFeedbackCarouselContent
data.value: Help me become better! Please share feedback on how I am doing so that my expert team can coach me better to help you! 😀
data.comment: Content for the third carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: ShareFeedbackCarouselTitle
data.comment: Title for the third carousel card in the welcome tour

data.name: SomewhatRelevantChoiceText
data.comment: Text for the choice that represents a moderate relevancy for the search results

data.name: SubmitFeedbackButtonText
data.comment: Text for the button to properly submit feedback

data.name: TakeATourButtonText
data.comment: Button text for taking a tour which launches the carousel card

data.name: TourIntroText
data.value: If you want to know more about the bulleted items that have been mentioned, make sure to click on the button that reads _Take a tour_
data.comment: Text that will introduce the tour to the user

data.name: UnrecognizedInputCardContentPart1
data.value: Turns out there is something that my tiny 🤖 🧠 just cannot figure out!
data.comment: First line of the unrecognized input content

data.name: UnrecognizedInputCardContentPart2
data.value: However, it may just be that you as the end user may not *have the right idea* about what I do. Click on the *Welcome Message* button to find out what I do
data.comment: Second line of the unrecognized input content

data.name: UnrecognizedInputCardTitleText
data.comment: The title content of the unrecognized input card

data.name: UnrecognizedInputTakeATour
data.comment: The text on the unrecognized input button with regards to the button

data.name: ViewFullArticleButtonText
data.comment: Text for viewing the full article

data.name: ViewRelatedArticlesButtonText
data.comment: Text for viewing related articles

data.comment: Bulleted list item 1

data.name: WelcomeCardBulletListItem2
data.comment: Bulleted list item 2

data.name: WelcomeCardBulletListItem3
data.comment: Bulleted list item 3

data.name: WelcomeCardContentPart1
data.value: If you are reading this, it is because you are wondering about what I do. I am {0}, a simple bot that will query against a knowledge base and return you an answer.
data.comment: The first part of the welcome card content with {0} as the bot display name

data.name: WelcomeCardContentPart2
data.value: You can ask me about many topics such as:
data.comment: The second part of the welcome card content

data.name: WelcomeCardContentPart3
data.value: If I am unable to help you with a question, I will connect you with an expert.
data.comment: The third part of the welcome card content

data.name: WelcomeCardTitleText
data.comment: The welcome card title text
